content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 1500.3 - Calculations

State Regulations
(a) Composite wage
rate =((prevailing wages + prevailing benefits for carpenter) + (prevailing
wages + prevailing benefits for electrician) + (prevailing wages + prevailing
benefits for plumber)) / 3. (b) Cost of labor index = 100 + (0.55 x (National Producer Price Index (NPPI) for
the construction industry - 100)) + (0.45x (statewide Current Employment

Statistics Index (CESI) for the construction industry - 100)), where both the
NPPI and the CESI are first adjusted to reflect percentage change from a common
base year. (c) Composite weighted
average hourly wage for construction industry employees = ((average hourly wage
for SIC 15 employees statewide) (total number of SIC 15 employees statewide)
+(average hourly wage for SIC 17 employees statewide) (total number of SIC 17
employees statewide)) / (total number of SIC 15 and SIC 17 employees
statewide). Notes
